header.title: Discover How MindScan Works
header.subtitle: Follow these steps to understand how your organization can benefit from our tool.

steps.title: Contact Us
steps.description: Fill out our form to request a demo and learn more about how MindScan works.

steps.title: Demo and License Purchase
steps.description: Experience the tool firsthand and purchase licenses to get started.

steps.title: Account and Company Setup
steps.description: We create your admin account and configure your company in the platform.

steps.title: Invite Users
steps.description: The admin can invite team members to join the company and access diagnostics.

steps.title: Complete Diagnoses
steps.description: Each user completes their diagnosis, consuming one license per session.

steps.title: Access Results
steps.description: Both users and admins can access detailed reports generated after each diagnosis.

final_section.text: Empower your organization with MindScan today. Contact us to get started.
